Select a Factory to get access to Build.message: Ṡέ⌊έϲҭ ȃ Ϝȃϲҭȏȓу ҭȏ ɠέҭ ȃϲϲέƨƨ ҭȏ ฿մї⌊ɗ ฿ȃȓ
Select a Factory to get access to Build.original: Select a Factory to get access to Build Bar

[style=text_callout]Control + Left Click.message: [style=text_callout]Ҫȏƞҭȓȏ⌊ + ₤έғҭ Ҫ⌊їϲќ[/style] ȃ մƞїҭ ҭȏ ʍȃќέ ȃ ғȃϲҭȏȓу ⍴ȓȏɗմϲέ ȃ ƨїƞɠ⌊έ ȏƞέ ȏғ ҭнȃҭ մƞїҭ Бέғȏȓέ ϲȏƞҭїƞմїƞɠ ῴїҭн ҭнέ ȓέƨҭ ȏғ ҭнέ Бմї⌊ɗ Գմέմέ.
[style=text_callout]Control + Left Click.original: [style=text_callout]Control + Left Click[/style] a unit to make a factory produce a single one of that unit before continuing with the rest of the build queue.

[style=text_callout]Left Click[/style] u.message: [style=text_callout]₤έғҭ Ҫ⌊їϲќ[/style] մƞїҭƨ ȏƞ ฿մї⌊ɗ ฿ȃȓ ҭȏ Бմї⌊ɗ
[style=text_callout]Left Click[/style] u.original: [style=text_callout]Left Click[/style] units on Build Bar to build

[style=text_callout]Right Click[/style].message: [style=text_callout]ℝїɠнҭ Ҫ⌊їϲќ[/style] ȏȓ [style=text_callout]Ṡнїғҭ + ℝїɠнҭ Ҫ⌊їϲќ[/style] ȏƞ մƞїҭƨ ҭȏ ȓέɗմϲέ ƞմʍБέȓ ȏғ մƞїҭƨ їƞ Գմέմέ
[style=text_callout]Right Click[/style].original: [style=text_callout]Right Click[/style] or [style=text_callout]Shift + Right Click[/style] on units to reduce number of units in queue

[style=text_callout]Shift + Left Click[/.message: [style=text_callout]Ṡнїғҭ + ₤έғҭ Ҫ⌊їϲќ[/style] մƞїҭƨ ȏƞ ฿մї⌊ɗ ฿ȃȓ ҭȏ Бմї⌊ɗ ʍմ⌊ҭї⍴⌊έ
[style=text_callout]Shift + Left Click[/.original: [style=text_callout]Shift + Left Click[/style] units on Build Bar to build multiple
